ref: 12080 vr̥ścáti ʻ cuts down or off or asunder ʼ RV. 2. vraścati BhP. (vráścana -- n. ʻ cutting ʼ ŚBr.). 3. vŕ̊kṣatē ʻ chooses ʼ Dhātup. (cf. aor. avrākṣīt Vop., vr̥kṣi TS.). [There has been collison (cf. RV. vr̥ktvīˊ replaced by AV. vr̥ṣṭvāˊ) of √vr̥k (RV. vr̥kṇá -- 1: Av. varč -- ʻ drag ʼ) with √vraśc in vŕ̊kṣatē and with √vr̥ś (vr̥śa -- , vr̥ṣa -- in vr̥ṣadaṁśa -- s.v. vr̥kadaṁśa -- , vŕ̊śyati ʻ chooses ʼ ~ várkatē ʻ accepts ʼ Dhātup. (J. C. W.). -- √vraśc]
P. burchṇā, bursṇā ʻ to cut slightly, trim ʼ;
H. bīchnā ʻ to pick out, select, choose ʼ.
